page.title: 13The Meetin'o'the Watters
page.content:
(Cont. from page12) weeks afor.It'ad been a scumfishin'het day,so the lads had gyen doon to the river to dowk an'git keuld off.Thoo kens thon big whirrlpool wheer the East Allen meets West,a bit abyen Cupola Brig? It myekes a flaysome soond when it's i'flood:black wi'peta off Killhope Top an'milk white froth spinning roond.The porr thoughtless lad gat sooked in an couldna get oot.See'st tha'this bonny bit currl aa tyek frae his brae wher naebody was by 'an'aa've keept it sin syne wrapped up in a patch o'silk.Whilk o' the twee's the softer,ye canna tell.
A.Leslie Philipson
June 1985
